title: New Updates to Carolingian UI!
content:
New features from v1.16.0:

  • Floating Camera Dock: You can now choose to auto-resize the floating camera dock horizontally or vertically based on the number of players online.
  • Scaling: Option to resize elements and some fonts of Carolingian UI;
  • Root folders: Show root folders from scene directory to Scene Navigation;

Updates from v1.14.0:

  • Scene Preview: shows thumbnail preview of the scene in navigation (turn off in settings);
  • Back Button: on top bar, go back to a previous scene (default option), or to go back from a folder to default view (configure in settings);

And a few other details and settings options! Check more on Github repo or Discord
